results.name: wordpress-deployment/wordpress

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-648756c5cf-b5czf Pod/wordpress-648756c5cf-l6mn8], expected 2

results.details:
Error: The service has no ready endpoints because the specified pods are not ready, even though 2 are expected.

Solution: 
1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`.
2. Inspect pod logs with `kubectl logs <pod-name>`.
3. Verify readiness probes in pod spec.
4. Ensure pods are running without errors.

results.name: wordpress-deployment/wordpress-648756c5cf-b5czf

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.
